CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Rural Logistics relative to Express Couriers?
SRP.A: Rural Logistics is {above} Express Couriers in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Express Couriers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Rural Logistics}.

VE.Q: What is Same-Day Services's Delivery Time in 2005?
VE.A: Same-Day Services's delivery time in 2005 is {2.45} days.

VE.Q: What is Rural Logistics's Delivery Time in 2013?
VE.A: Rural Logistics's delivery time in 2013 is {1.04} days.

VE.Q: What is Drone Delivery's Delivery Time in 2012?
VE.A: Drone Delivery's delivery time in 2012 is {1.49} days.

VE.Q: What are the delivery time of Drone Delivery, Express Couriers, and Rural Logistics in 2006?
VE.A: Drone Delivery's delivery time is {2.78} days, Express Couriers's delivery time is {2.78} days, Rural Logistics's delivery time is {2.30} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum delivery time is {0.96} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum delivery time is {4.21} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Delivery Time level recorded for Drone Delivery?
EVJ.A: Drone Delivery reached approximately {2.81} days in {2005}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Delivery Time level recorded for Drone Delivery?
EVJ.A: Drone Delivery's lowest recorded level is approximately {1.15} days in {2014}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Delivery Time?
SC.A: The average total delivery time is {9.16} days.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Delivery Time go below 8.84 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time fall between 8.65 and 9.56 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time exceed 9.36 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2012, was the average total Delivery Time higher or lower than between 2008 and 2014?
NC.A: The average total delivery time between 2005 and 2012 was {higher} than between 2008 and 2014.

NC.Q: Was the total Delivery Time in 2005 higher or lower than in 2012?
NC.A: The total delivery time in 2005 was {higher} than in 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2011 and 2014, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 2011 and 2014 was {smaller} than between 2006 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2014, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 2005 and 2014?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 2006 and 2014 was {larger} than between 2005 and 2014.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Express Couriers} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Rural Logistics, Drone Delivery, Same-Day Services, Express Couriers}.
